name: Blue Beta: No Trash In Here
name_original: Blue Beta: No Trash In Here
description:
A game made with the theme of #teamseas for the polymars gamejam, you're a blue beta who is very angry with all the polution of the oceans and he will destroy every ocean polluter.

this game can be played with mouse and keyboard,controller,and on mobile too.       the web version might have some bugs if you want a better experience you can either download the rar and play it on pc or you can download the apk and play it on android too.

Made by Joel Marques

Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7tPG6v5qkuOHhkn5aJ4qDg
